name: Latent Timespace No.4: From Magic Snowflake to the Winter in Beijing
description:
To celebrate the Beijing Winter Olympics 2022, I cooperated with AI to synthesize an animated transition video from magic snow flake to the winter in Beijing, which will reveal the beauty from micro elements to macro world.

Introduction of the series: Latent Timespace, is the invisible higher dimensional space-time. The three-dimensional universe we currently see may only be a drop in the universe ocean. This series aims to reveal the knowable or unknowable sceneries in parallel universe with the help of artificial intelligence (AI), expanding the boundaries of vision that were normally limited in three dimensions.
